entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
